channel.title: Wtf is wrong with my commands?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my commands?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“Wildcat_240, post:10, topic:134247”][quote author=s0ul reap3r link=topic=185631.msg1680508#msg1680508 date=1187331005]
:rolleyes: oh so i did that right and why wont they work?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 06:57:33 PM[/size][hr]do you know why they still arent working?
[/quote]

No…you don’t have that right… you need the " (playerRights >= 2))"

(playerRights >= 2)) is good…playerRights >= 2) is bad.[/quote]

if(command.startsWith("name") && playerRights >= 2)

Works perfectly fine… You don’t have to have the parentheses around the playerRights.

Read full topic

you just put…

try this…

^^ use that X}

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my commands?
item.dc:creator: @s0ul_reap3r s0ul reap3r
item.description:
@s0ul_reap3r wrote:

hey im wondering why my commands wont work???

will someone plz help me fix them

i have them listed below:

public void MainHelpMenu()
{
if(playerRights < 4){

					}

public void laws()
{
sendQuest("@dbl@>>> Server Laws <<<", 8145);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@1. You have gota ask there permition if they want to fight", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@2. No Massing!", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@3. No doing Combo’s", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@4. No 0 Iteming", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@5. If caught item scaming you will be banned", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@6. No drop trading", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@7. Asking for another players pass is not tolerated", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@8. No offensive language", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@9. No Luring", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@10. No far Casting with mage", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@1IF YOU DONT FOLLOW THESE YOU MAY BE BANNED", 8158);
sendQuestSomething(8161);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
public void modcommands()
{
sendQuest("@dbl@Mod commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@::pinin", 8143);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pinset", 8144);
sendQuest("@dbl@::master", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pure", 8146);
sendQuest("@dbl@::modlook", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@::jesus", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@::blackdhide", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@::reddhide", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@::balla", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@::2bill", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@::runeboots", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@::backpack", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@::santa", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@::maskset", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@::fury", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@::capeset", 8158);
sendQuest("@dbl@::bars", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@::gilded", 8160);;
sendQuestSomething(8161);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
public void admincommands()
{
sendQuest("@dbl@Admin Commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@::pinin", 8146);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pinset", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@::master", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@::poon", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@::mage1", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@::mage2", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@::mage3", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@::staffs", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@::goldmystic", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@::byebye", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@::show", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@::peekaboo", 8157);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“playercommands”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
playercommands();

                                    sendQuest("@dbl@::ipban(user)
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@::ban(user) 
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@::mute(user)
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@::pickup(itemnumber)

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my commands?
